mapper.select: select videonum , title , url , originalfile , savedfile , to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate , hitcount , recommendation , decommendation from EducationVideo order by regdate desc
select videonum , title , url , originalfile , savedfile , to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate , hitcount , recommendation , decommendation from EducationVideo where videonum = #{videoNum}
